title: VShots - Excellent Indian Short Video

creator: Vshots
descriptionHtml:
VShots: Best Indian Short Videos App 

► Original Short Videos App made in India 
► Create trending Music Videos 
► Fun Dialogue Dubbing 
► Post Real Videos 
► Viral Lip-Sync Videos

VShots is a short video format app made in India. A short video community for budding creators, Vshots provides rich video content and encourage creation full of imagination.

Create short funny videos on the go, show your talent, enact your favorite movies dialogue, dance videos, and a lot more, share on Facebook, Whatsapp, and other social media platforms on VShots. Edit videos using our unique editing features and create viral content.
VShots offers you real and fun videos that you can watch and share on social media. Browse all types of videos, ranging from trending, Entertaining, Funny Video songs, Wishes, Love quotes, Status video, Good morning, Good night, Shayaris and other Viral Clips.

Main Features

► Viral videos
Browse trending videos, funny, amazing videos just in a swipe! Load instantly, smooth interface, and lag free.

► Rich music library
An evolving music library with fresh editor's picks. Take your creative potential to the next level and unlock the world of endless possibilities.

► Trending Stickers
Choose from a wide range of trending stickers to emote what you feel

► Save and share status
Up to 10,000 status videos available for you to pick.

► Shoot and edit the way you like
Record the most creative side of you and share with your fans!

► Beauty cam 
Choose from a wide range of beauty effects and filters during shooting a video.

► Video editor
Combine and adjust your videos to the way you need them to be.

Content languages
Hindi, Gujarati, English, Bhojpuri.

Support
VShots.app@gmail.com
